onboarding.intro.title: About GlobGram and Nostr
onboarding.intro.desc: GlobGram is a lightweight, private messenger built on Nostrâ€”an open, decentralized protocol for relaying signed messages. No central accounts, no lock-in.
onboarding.intro.nostr: With Nostr you own your identity (your key) and your data. You can use any Nostr-compatible app, connect to one or many relays, and mirror your messages so you can switch apps or relays later without losing access. Your messages are signed by your key and sent through community relaysâ€”not controlled by a single app or server.

onboarding.step4.title: Step 4 â€” Your key
onboarding.step4.desc: Generate a new key or import an existing one (hex or nsec). It stays in your browser.

onboarding.step5.title: Step 5 â€” Install the app
onboarding.step5.desc: Install GlobGram to your device for a faster, more app-like experience.

onboarding.step6.tip1: Use â€œConnect safely with your friendâ€ to share an invite link or QR.
onboarding.step6.tip2: Start a chat and send text or media; press Enter to send (Shift+Enter for new line).
onboarding.step6.tip3: Optionally encrypt media with a passphrase for extra protection.
